data.name: Spurr Loyalty Management App
data.description: Spurr Loyalty Management App is an admin console for managing customer's loyalty. For this project, I helped to migrate the app from jQuery to React, Built new features and maintained it.

data.name: Spurr Revamped Company Profile Website
data.description: I was collaborated with UI/UX Team to built revamped company profile website using Wordpress & Elementor. I am also customized it with additional CSS and JavaScript.

data.name: GMT Group Company Profile Website
data.description: I built company profile website for Global Multipro Technology (a lighting company) using modern libraries & frameworks. I helped with deployment process. I am also optimized the SEO and the website's performance speed.

data.name: PT. Isra Presisi Indonesia TBK Company Profile Website
data.description: PT. Isra Presisi Indonesia TBK is a company focused on manufacture precision parts. I built this company profile website using wordpress and elementor. I implemented multi languages feature for this website. I am also helped with deployment process.

data.name: PT Aristo Satria Mandiri Indonesia Company Profile Website
data.description: PT Aristo Satria Mandiri Indonesia is a company focused on manufacture precision parts. I built this company profile website using wordpress and elementor. I implemented multi languages feature for this website. I am also helped with deployment process.

data.name: PT. Mega Dagang Internasional KPI Dashboard
data.description: PT. Mega Dagang Internasional is a company that focused on retail business. I built KPI Dashboard to monitoring statistic using React, Bootstrap, Inertia JS as Front End and Laravel as backend
